header.title: PCL Serializer
header.abstract: This document describes the pcl serializer of Cocoon.

s1.title: PCL Serializer
s1.p: The pcl serializer takes fo xml events as input. By using the FOP project it creates pcl out of the sax events.
This serializer is optional and requires the fop package in the lib directory when building cocoon 2. However, the distribution includes this package already.
